TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NgramExtractingEstimator extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.ML.Core.Data.IEstimator`1<class Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Text.NgramExtractingTransformer>
Public NotInheritable Class NgramExtractingEstimator Implements IEstimator(Of NgramExtractingTransformer)

Docs.summary: Produces a bag of counts of ngrams(sequences of consecutive values of length 1-n) in a given vector of keys. It does so by building a dictionary of ngrams and using the id in the dictionary as the index in the bag.
